2016 warshaye palamu karthuwe aarthika wardhanaya ihala yayi juni 16, 2016 shri lankawe mulu dala jathika nishpadithaya 2016 warshayedi palamu karthuwa (janawari, pebarawara, martha) sandaha sthawara mila ganan (2010) yatathe rupiyal miliyana 2,088,024k lesa asthamenthu kara athi bawa janalekhana ha sankhyalekhana departhamenthuwa pawasayi. 2015 palamu karthuwe di mema dala jathika nishpadithaya rupiyal miliyana 1,978,609k lesa wartha wi atha.
